divs: sighting detailsi've always been a skeptic, but this i've never been able to exsplain even to my self? what is it? what hapend? why? it was a clear day not a cloud in the sky not even one!!! then i look up and a cloud like formation just over head, in the center a swiral of lights and colors, this hapened aroung noon time for only a few minuts it seemed? then it was gone and the sun was setting\ who ever reads this if you know of any one that can identify my drawing of what i saw please email me! i didn't know much or any thing about ufos before this event! can some one tell me what it was? i don't tell people about this because its not taken sereusly by any one, so i've keped it quiet to my self for all these years. some one please email me thank you.
